Name: White Water Ballad
Desc4: While the equipper is within any <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>, their CRIT Rate increases by 12%. After leaving the <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>, this buff persists for 15 seconds. When the equipper is an <color=#FFFFFF>[Attack]</color> Character, activating or extending the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color> additionally increases their CRIT Rate by 12% for 30 seconds; repeated triggers reset the duration.
Story: This ancient melody was inscribed on yellowed paper, tucked away in the "Qingming Sword Manual" for years. No one knows who composed it - probably some long-forgotten Sword Keeper lost to the mists of time.
